Name: Sex Adventures - Cuckold Gym
About the game: About the game An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a personal trainer becoming a cuckold for his very sexy client and her overbearing boyfriend, who decided to drop by unexpected at the gym. Visual Novel Description Amber Brown is not Daniel’s only client at the gym, but is by far the hottest girl he’s ever had the pleasure of training with. Fiery red hair, killer legs, and a waist to die for. Not to mention the barely-there shorts she always puts on when she’s training with him…or the sweet moans she lets out whenever he makes her do the squats. She’s hot, confident and always flirting with him. No wonder poor Daniel has a hard time focusing on anything other than those sexy glutes of hers and the training always ends with the need of a very cold shower. The problem is…she has a boyfriend. And a very cocky one. Travis Finn is not the guy to be messed with, especially when it comes to his gorgeous young girlfriend. … It’s Monday evening. Daniel and Amber are in the middle of their training when Travis walks in and catches the trainer ogling his girlfriend’s ass. He has a reputation to maintain, so there’s no way he can let the boy’s indiscretion pass without some kind of punishment. Luckily for the trainer, he’s in no mood for punching the boy, so he decides to try another tactic and put the boner in his pants to great use. … Will Daniel learn his lesson not to mess with other guy’s girlfriends? Follow our story and find out… Features - 60+ HD renders - Animations
